participant_1.background:
I am close to my parents, but we are not very similar.
I live in a small apartment with my cat Charlie, but I dream of having a house with a big yard so they can run around.
I'm a bit nervous about going to the baby shower because I'm worried about being stared at.
I have no use for a crib, but I would love to have a music studio in my dorm room.
I've been with my current partner for three years, and we're going strong.

participant_2.background:
I spent quality time with my children and avoided the obligations of social obligations.
I enjoy capturing the beauty of Pittsburgh through my camera.
I played my guitar to my cat before bed last night.
i sew my own clothes.
I have never been in a fight, but I would defend myself if I had to.

content.text: I'm heading to a baby shower soon. I'm a bit nervous because I don't know anyone there.
A baby shower? Oh fun! I love babies. I have two of my own.
That's awesome! I've always wanted kids but I'm not sure I'm ready yet.
When you're ready, you'll know. It's the best thing that's ever happened to me.
I'm sure it is. I'm just not sure if I'm ready for that kind of responsibility yet.
It's a lot of work but it's so rewarding. I love watching my kids grow up and learn new things.
That's what I'm looking forward to. Watching them grow up and become their own people.
It's a really amazing experience. I'm glad I'm a parent.
I'm glad you're happy. Maybe one day I'll be ready to have kids too.
I hope so! You'd be a great parent.
No problem. I'm always happy to talk about my kids.
They are! I'm so lucky to have them.
